product_overview: Productive Me is a comprehensive personal productivity dashboard designed to help users monitor and manage their activities, screen time, tasks, calendar events, financial budgets, and receive real-time notifications within a streamlined and user-friendly interface. It integrates AI assistance and external data sources including weather, news, and stock information to enhance decision-making and personal efficiency.
core_goals: Provide a centralized dashboard aggregating key personal productivity metrics including weather, activity tracking, and financial overviews.
Enable efficient task management with a Kanban board supporting drag-and-drop, task prioritization, and due dates.
Offer a robust calendar system for event creation, viewing, and history, supporting multiple views (month, week, day).
Facilitate personal finance tracking including income, expenses, cashflow, and budget management.
Deliver an AI-powered assistant to support users in task scheduling, budgeting analysis, event creation, news summarization, and screen time advice.
Implement a secure and user-friendly authentication flow with profile management.
Support responsive design and theme customization for an optimal user experience across devices and preferences.
key_features: Dashboard featuring widgets for weather updates, activity graphs, sticky notes, news, stocks, and screen time tracking.
Task Manager with a Kanban board enabling drag-and-drop, task prioritization, due date management, and performance insights.
Calendar module with month, week, and day views, event creation, event history, and a mini-calendar widget.
Finance Tracker to manage budgets, income, expenses, and cashflow, helping users maintain financial health.
AI Copilot assistant with chat interface, streaming response, function calling (e.g., createTask, scheduleEvent, analyzeBudget), and retrieval-augmented generation integration.
Real-time notifications system delivering alerts for tasks, events, and system updates with a dedicated notification sidebar.
User authentication via Supabase including sign-in, sign-up, session management, and profile customization with avatar uploads.
Mobile-responsive layouts with a bottom navigation bar, hamburger menu, and theme toggling supporting dark and light modes.
Integration with external APIs such as Open-Meteo for weather, GNews for news, and Alpha Vantage for stock data.
user_flow_summary: Users sign up or sign in using email/password authentication, then access a personalized dashboard aggregating all productivity data.
Users navigate to the Task Manager to create, prioritize, update, and track tasks using a drag-and-drop Kanban board.
Users create and view calendar events across multiple views (month/week/day), review event history, and use mini-calendar widgets for quick navigation.
Users manage their finances by inputting income and expenses, setting budgets, tracking cashflow, and viewing summarized financial analytics.
Users interact with the AI Copilot assistant to receive help with scheduling, budgeting analysis, news summarization, and personalized advice on screen time management.
Users receive and manage real-time notifications through the notification sidebar, marking notifications as read and responding as needed.
Users customize app settings including account details, notifications preferences, and language settings.
Users access help and support through a contact form, receiving assistance from the support team as needed.
validation_criteria: Successful user authentication with secure session management and profile handling.
Accurate and real-time display of dashboard widgets including weather, activity graphs, news, and screen time data.
Smooth drag-and-drop functionality in the Task Manager with correct task updating and persistence.
Correct rendering and interaction of calendar views and event management functionalities.
Comprehensive finance tracker calculations reflecting income, expenses, budgets, and cashflow accurately.
Reliable AI Copilot responses with appropriate function calls executed successfully and chat interface streaming.
Real-time notification delivery and correct notification management workflows.
Responsive UI adapting appropriately on mobile devices with theme toggling functional across all components.
Seamless integration and data retrieval from external APIs for weather, news, and stocks.
Robust database schema enforcing RLS to ensure data isolation per user.
